function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Variation in regulations between geographic locations","Impact":"Difficulty in creating and posting correct information in rapidly changing circumstances","Mitigation":"Standardizing content and information across geographic locations, real-time updates of regulations","Technologies":"Digital signage with real-time content updates, cloud-based collaboration tools","People":"Retailers, businesses, public health agencies","Owner":"Retailers, businesses, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Lack of readily available COVID-19 content and necessary software code for digital signs","Impact":"Inability to display important public health information in real time","Mitigation":"Collaboration with technology providers, development of content management systems for digital signs","Technologies":"Content management systems, digital signage software, cloud-based content storage","People":"Technology providers, digital signage operators, public health agencies","Owner":"Technology providers, digital signage operators, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Repurposing equipment as a coping mechanism for retailers","Impact":"Potential for ineffective communication and operational management","Mitigation":"Training for effective equipment repurposing, standardizing repurposed equipment use","Technologies":"Training programs, standardized equipment usage guidelines","People":"Retailers, store managers, operations teams","Owner":"Retailers, store managers, operations teams"}]}
